job.title: Senior Data Scientist - Search and NLP
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description:
Grainger is North America's leading distributor of maintenance, repair, and operating products and services. Our wide assortment, deep expertise, innovative technology solutions and unparalleled customer service keep customers' operations running and their people safe.
We're looking for passionate people who can move our company forward. We have a welcoming workplace where you can build a career for yourself while fulfilling our purpose to keep the world working. We embrace new ways of thinking and recognize everyone is an individual. Find your way at Grainger.
Position Details
You will join a team of software engineers, data scientists and ML engineers working on high impact problems in the fields of Search, Information Retrieval, NLP, Product Similarity & Matching and Recommendations. You will report to the Senior Manager, Data Science.
You Will
Develop production-level code that runs, trains, and maintains ML models
Build code to run in production
Conduct exploratory data analysis activities on available data.
Develop experimental and analytic plans for data modeling processes, use of baselines, ability to determine cause and effect relations
Build pipelines from data lakes to feed models
Work toward agreement between our strategy and data science deliverables
Provide recommendations to collaborators to solve business issues through data-driven methods and embedded model deployment
You Have
Master's in Computer Science / Applied Mathematics / Engineering / Physics
4+ years of experience as a Data Scientist in Vision, NLP, Recommender Systems or Data Science for Enterprise Search
Proficiency in Python, SQL and Bash
Experience with ML/DL toolkits: Keras, PyTorch, Tensorflow, scikit-learn, SparkML and other service such as Kafka, Redis, Postgres, Spark, or Snowflake
Experience with identifying, scoping and leading complex data science projects with collaborators and high impact
Background in NLP such as Document Classification & Clustering, Intent Prediction, Knowledge Graph, Multi-Modal Search, Text Summarization and Generation
Experience in many different technologies and the full model lifecycle, typically ranging from data pipelines, data extraction, model training, model serving, labeling tools, ML-ops, ad-hoc tooling and all points in between
Our Benefits
Comprehensive healthcare plans
PTO and family leave
Retirement plans
We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender, gender identity or expression, or veteran status. We are proud to be an equal opportunity workplace.
